# 3rd Party Components

- The folders here are 3rd party PHP components.
- The components are from selected commits in their git repositories.
- The components were copied directly (not via Composer).
- Below, please find the list of components used by this extension.

Component         Github repo               Commit
----------------- ------------------------- --------------------------
polyfill-mbstring symfony/polyfill-mbstring 766ee47e6565 27 Feb 2020
zxcvbn-php        bjeavons/zxcvbn-php       d5ebb2651bab 15 Sep 2018 *

* An older commit was used to retain compatibility with PHP 5.6.
